text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Trainer, what kind of okonomiyaki do you like?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Myself～ I like the special okonomiyaki with everything in it, like shrimp, squid, and scallops!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Don't you get happy when you see a lot of 
toppings and it feels more luxurious～?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Although my friends told me "That's so 
simplistic～"…… I'm right, aren't I? 
It's more luxurious……
